name: Essentlal
features:
1. Affordable subscription prices 2. Suitable for all types of organizations
3. Suitable for long duration projects
4. Access to new major updates of carSPICE
5. Consulting hours
6. Possibility to upgrade the subscription

description.name: carSPICE Process Landscape including ASPICE templates
description.modal: Access to ASPICE process landscape carSPICE including ASPICE Templates for the following all processes in VDA scope (MAN.3, SUP.1, SUP.9, SUP.10, SUP.8, ACQ.4, SYS.2, SYS.3, SYS.4, SYS.5, SWE.1, SWE.2, SWE.3, SWE.4, SWE.5, SWE.6)

description.name: Minor updates of carSPICE
description.modal: The minor update includes bugfixes, tool security updates etc. on the latest version you have purchased.

description.name: Product Support
description.modal:
Product support on technical issues*
*This support only covers the technical issue related to carSPICE.

description.name: Major updates of carSPICE
description.modal:
The next updates include the upcoming ASPICE levels (Level 4 and 5)
Keep an eye on our future update section here.

description.name: Consulting Hours (max. per month/year)
description.data:
3 hours per month*
* Special price on additional consulting hours
description.modal: Consulting hours with our ASPICE experts are designed to advise you on tailoring the carSPICE to your project need.

description.name: Transfer of Consulting Hours
description.modal: Transfer of unused consulting hours to next year.

description.name: ASPICE Assessors for official ASPICE Assessment
description.modal:
Recommendation of intacs certified ASPICE Assessors from our partner network for your official ASPICE assessments at a special price*.
* The assessment charges are billed separately. Earliest availability in December 2023.
